channel.title: BetaPkz - 317 - VPS Hosted
channel.description:
[center][b]Welcome![/b][/center] [center] CLIENT - https://mega.co.nz/#!6hhVwY7T!2eRatx3Ti8oNXHxtIyj7HyC19K3p_ODxu1VqWF9cEPI- Credit to surpremex for jaring[/center]
[center]Lets kick things off, this is a new server, a server that will be kept on, it is an aggroth based source for now till i make my own changes, but 100% credits obviously for him for the source.[/center]
[center]The rank system -[/center] [center]0) Player 1) Bronze Donator 2) Iron Donator 3) Adamant Donator 4) Rune Donator 5) Dragon Donator 6) Dicer 7) Veteran 8) Helper or Test Mod 9) Moderator 10) Administrator 11) Co-Owner 12) Owner 13) Developer All these ranks have their own icons[/center]
[center]All the top bosses ALL WORKING![/center] [center]Tormented demons...[/center] [center]Corp beast...[/center] [center]ect.. ect..[/center]
[center][u][b]-Fully working SAGITTARIAN[/b][/u][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/a41314503085ec5b7a3cb08c0b3edcd4.png[/img][/center]
[center][u][b]Wilderness ditch -[/b][/u] [/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/38c6fffd470273131602436f85c2d6d6.gif[/img][/center]
[center][b][u]718 revision![/u][/b][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/936b90f9e33863696a85d5d8dfd7402d.png[/img][/center]
[center][u][b]Max cape![/b][/u][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/dfddcf7fae9a66c3c9af2dea78742cef.png[/img][/center]
[center][b][u]Fully working Drygores![/u][/b][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/0922709bb223f1a46da04574c2907d7f.png[/img][/center]
[center][u][b]Credits to - Shaloxis Ryan Faris TrisidiaX Tokashi Surpremex For the source, client and pictures [/b][/u][/center]

item.title: BetaPkz - 317 - VPS Hosted
item.dc:creator: @poison_blood poison blood
item.description:
@poison_blood wrote:

[center]Welcome![/center]
[center] CLIENT - https://mega.co.nz/#!6hhVwY7T!2eRatx3Ti8oNXHxtIyj7HyC19K3p_ODxu1VqWF9cEPI- Credit to surpremex for jaring[/center]

[center]Lets kick things off, this is a new server, a server that will be kept on, it is an aggroth based source for now till i make my own changes, but 100% credits obviously for him for the source.[/center]

[center]The rank system -[/center]
[center]0) Player

  1. Bronze Donator
  2. Iron Donator
  3. Adamant Donator
  4. Rune Donator
  5. Dragon Donator
  6. Dicer
  7. Veteran
  8. Helper or Test Mod
  9. Moderator
  10. Administrator
  11. Co-Owner
  12. Owner
  13. Developer
    All these ranks have their own icons[/center]

[center]All the top bosses ALL WORKING![/center]
[center]Tormented demons…[/center]
[center]Corp beast…[/center]
[center]ect… ect…[/center]

[center]-Fully working SAGITTARIAN[/center]
[center][/center]
